REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0419 reute b f BC-NORWAY-ISSUES-60-BILL 03-25 0071

TEXT.TITLE: NORWAY ISSUES 60 BILLION YEN EUROBOND
TEXT.BODY: Norway is issuing a 60 billion yen eurobond due April 22, 1992 paying 4-1/4 pct and priced at 101-5/8 pct, lead manager Nomura International Ltd said. The non-callable issue will be available in denominations of one mln yen and will be listed in London. The fees comprise 1-1/4 pct selling concession with 5/8 pct management and underwriting combined. REUTER
